mapper.sql: id, gmt_create, gmt_modified, kind, level, description, onsite_record, onsite_manager, onsite_manager_code, follow_up, plan_time, supervisor, supervisor_code, status, deleted
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from hidden_danger
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into hidden_danger (id, gmt_create, gmt_modified, kind, level, description, onsite_record, onsite_manager, onsite_manager_code, follow_up, plan_time, supervisor, supervisor_code, status, deleted ) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{kind,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{level,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{onsiteRecord,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{onsiteManager,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{onsiteManagerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{followUp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{planTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{supervisor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supervisorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
